title: Artificial Intelligence and Warfare - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/29/19
itunes:title: Artificial Intelligence and Warfare - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/29/19
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett and retired US Army national security expert Bob Maginnis explore how artificial intelligence is changing warfare, and whether America and China are working to improve computers and robots to fight future wars.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
